name: Lito-v2-Ubuntu-Noble
postCreateCommand: npm install -g firebase-tools && ([ -d /home/vscode/.antigravity-server/bin ] && cd /home/vscode/.antigravity-server/bin && for dir in *-*; do [ -d "$dir" ] && commit=${dir#*-} && [ ! -e "$commit" ] && ln -s "$dir" "$commit" && echo "Fixed Antigravity path: $dir -> $commit"; done || true)
